name: Crafted_Touch_of_Lady_Grey_C
display_name: Crafted Touch of Lady Grey C
display_fullname: Boosts.Crafted Touch of Lady Grey C
display_help: Enhances the defense debuff potential of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Defense.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and the recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
power_display_names: Touch of Lady Grey: Defense Debuff/Recharge/Endurance Reduction
